alert.note: Alert for Boone; Gallatin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:11AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHERN RIPLEY, SOUTHERN DEARBORN, NORTHERN SWITZERLAND, BOONE AND CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 AM EDT... At 1011 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Osgood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Aurora, Rising Sun, Burlington, Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Wilmington, French, Hartford, Holton, Patriot, Aberdeen, Rexville, Cold Springs, Big Bone Lick, Waterloo and Steele Bottom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
